H0.text: Orbits are the curved paths that asteroids, comets, and planets move around the sun.

H1.text: Satellites are the curved paths around the sun that asteroids, comets, and planets move along.

H2.text: Curves are the curved paths that asteroids, comets, and planets follow as they move around the sun.

H3.text: Ellipticals are the curved paths that asteroids, comets, and planets move around the sun.

A4.text: Orbits are elliptical, with the more massive body at one focus of the ellipse.

A5.text: A line joining a planet and the Sun sweeps out equal areas during equal intervals of time.
